## MySQLConnectionOptions.uri property

Database URI.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
uri?: string;
```

## Remarks

May include host, port, database, username and password. Any additional options can be provided as query string parameters.

Any option individually specified in the options object overrides anything extracted from the URI.
